definitions: the action of restoring someone to health or normal life through training and therapy after imprisonment, addiction, or illness

examples.text: she underwent rehabilitation and was walking within three weeks

shortDefinitions: action of restoring someone to health or normal life through training and therapy after imprisonment, addiction, or illness

definitions: the action of restoring someone to former privileges or reputation after a period of disfavor

examples.text: a posthumous rehabilitation of the activist

shortDefinitions: action of restoring someone to former privileges or reputation after period of disfavour

definitions: the action of restoring something that has been damaged to its former condition

examples.text: the rehabilitation of the mangrove forests

shortDefinitions: action of restoring something that has been damaged to its former condition
